“Son of man, set your face toward the south, and preach toward the south, and prophesy against the forest of the field in the south.
Tell the forest of the south, ‘Hear
fire in you, and it will devour every green tree in you, and every dry tree. The burning flame will not be quenched, and all faces from the south to the north will be burned by it.
All flesh will see that I,
, have kindled it. It will not be quenched.”’”
